Description: I've sold 3 of these and people love them. They are beautiful instruments! The genuine American-made Seymour Duncan Jazz (neck) and JB (bridge) humbuckers give it 'tone to the bone' - clean or distorted. Play blues, rock, jazz, anything your heart desires! (I use a Boss BD-2 Blues Driver pedal and play it through a Kustom Defender 50W tube amp. Tone to die for.) Distinctive design with uptown appointments. Comes with a brand new deluxe gig bag- an OSP Vintage Tweed Duraguard 25mm thick bag. See the listing for one at https://www.ebay.com/itm/OSP-Vintage-Tweed-Duraguard-Electric-Guitar-Gig-Bag-25mm-3-Compartments-/131556643334. I'll also include the strap shown in pics (leather). This is a PC model NOT the newer, cheaper PS !!!!!!!!!! I believe it's a 2008 model based upon the serial number on back of headstock. W05088554 I would consider a trade (we both buy each other's listing) for a decent cello...long story. Check my feedback and buy with complete confidence! I ship within 24 hours of purchase. It will be fully insured and signature will be required for delivery. (Porch bandits would love this). If you need to give it as a present, I'd print off a picture and give them that until it arrives! If shipping with insurance is less than $45, I'll refund difference but prices keep going up.With its semi-hollow single-cutaway mahogany body and flamed maple top, this modern spin on a vintage-classic looks fantastic and sounds incredible. The ESP Xtone guitar features a 3-piece maple neck with rosewood fretboard, decked out with pearl and abalone block inlays. A 3-layer creme binding trims the body, neck, headstock, and f-hole, while gold hardware completes its uptown appearance. The Seymour Duncan Jazz (neck) and JB (bridge) gold-covered humbuckers gives it class and tonal versatility. Equipped with a tune-o-matic bridge with stopbar tailpiece and XJ frets. Controls include tone and volume for each pickup and 3-way switching.FEATURESConstruction: set neckScale: 24-3/4"Body: mahogany with bookmatched flamed maple topNeck/Fretboard: 3-piece maple/rosewoodNeck Shape: Thin UNut: Standard / 43 mmInlays: pearl and abalone blocksPickups: Seymour Duncan Jazz (neck) and JB (bridge) gold-covered humbuckersElectronics: 2 volume, 2 tone, 3-way toggleHardware: goldTuners: GroverBridge: tune-o-matic with stop tailpieceBinding: triple-layer creme (body, neck, headstock)Frets: 22 XJ
Title: RARE ESP LTD XTONE PC-1 Semi-Hollow Electric Guitar Real Duncans NEW DLX GIG BAG
ConditionDescription: Fantastic condition. No flaws, dings, or scratches. Frets like new.  All switches work and sound is awesome.
